mapper.select: SELECT R.RES_NO, A.ACCOM_NAME, O.ROOM_NO, A.ACCOM_ADDR, P.PAY_DATE, CONCAT(R.CHECKIN_DATE, ",", DAYNAME(R.CHECKIN_DATE)) AS CHECKIN_DATE, CONCAT(R.CHECKOUT_DATE, ",", DAYNAME(R.CHECKOUT_DATE)) AS CHECKOUT_DATE, P.PAY_PRICE, P.PAY_TYPE, A.ACCOM_SEQ, P.PAY_NO, R.RES_CHECK FROM payment P JOIN reservation R ON P.PAY_NO = R.PAY_NO JOIN room O ON O.ROOM_SEQ = R.ROOM_SEQ JOIN accommodation A ON A.ACCOM_SEQ = O.ACCOM_SEQ WHERE MEMBER_ID LIKE #{member_id} ORDER BY P.PAY_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (MEMBER_ID, NAME, PASSWORD, BIRTHDATE, GENDER, AGE, PHONE, NICKNAME, ADDRESS, PROFILEIMG, KAKAO) VALUES (#{member_id}, #{name}, #{password}, #{birthdate}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{phone}, #{nickname}, #{address}, #{profileimg}, #{kakao})
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member
MEMBER_ID LIKE #{member_id}
